snippet.title: Teen left hanging upside down in bungee jump gone wrong
snippet.content:
A teenager has been left dangling upside down for at least 20 minutes in a bungee jump gone wrong. Roger Rodriguez, 19, has said he will never bungee jump again after he was suspended 10m above the ground on Wednesday night at a California county fair. "I was about to pass out," Mr Rodrigues told the Ventura County Star. Ride operators say it was a mechanical failure that prevented them from being able to pull Mr Rodriguez back up or lower him down. The teen said he began to get a headache as he waited for emergency crews to arrive. The Ventura Fire Department eventually got Mr Rodriguez back to the ground using a ladder. Two fair goers who were trapped in the steel bungee box above were also rescued.
Related Articles
Authorities are investigating the incident. (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
